mapper.select:
SELECT TRUNC(c.bill_month, 'mm') bill_month, c.user_id, c.bill_status, sum(c.sys_money) sys_money, MAX(s.account) account FROM ext_channel_resource t LEFT JOIN EXT_BILL c ON c.ismg_id = t.ismg_id LEFT JOIN blade_user s ON s.id = c.user_id
and c.user_id = #{bill.userId}
and t.status > 0
GROUP BY TRUNC(c.bill_month, 'mm'), c.user_id, c.bill_status
mapper.insert:
merge into ext_bill t
select #{item.billStatus} as billStatus, #{item.ismgId} as ismgId, #{item.billMonth} as billMonth, #{item.userId} as userId from dual
on (t.ismg_id = c.ismgId and t.user_id = c.userId and TRUNC(t.bill_month) = TRUNC(c.billMonth)) when not matched then insert(id,ismg_id,user_id,bill_month,bill_status) values (seq_user.nextval,c.ismgId,c.userId,c.billMonth,c.billStatus)
mapper.update:
merge into ext_bill t using (SELECT TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm') vest_date, SUM(t.cmcc_delv + t.cu_delv + t.ct_delv) delv, t.ismg_id, cast(SUM((t.cmcc_delv + t.cu_delv + t.ct_delv) * s.unit_price) AS NUMBER(18, 2)) settle FROM SMSMAN.PM_RECEIPT t INNER JOIN ext_channel_resource c ON c.ismg_id = t.ismg_id INNER JOIN ext_quote_detail s ON s.channel_id = c.id
and TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm') = to_date(#{vestDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY TRUNC(t.vest_date, 'mm'),t.ismg_id) c on (t.ismg_id = c.ismg_id and t.bill_month = c.vest_date) when matched then update SET t.sys_amount = c.delv, t.sys_money = c.settle
